author: Skip Wilson
title: National Music Companies Partner to Help Greater NYC Musicians Find ‘The Perfect Instrument’
text:
New York City is home to some of the greatest musicians and music venues in the world which is why it is no surprise Buffet Group opened a high-end showroom in the heart of Manhattan back in 2013. Since its opening, the showroom has hosted numerous master classes and concerts and now, for the first time ever, it will open its doors for an exclusive Music & Arts event geared towards helping advancing musicians find the perfect instrument. Music & Arts , the largest school band and orchestra instrument retailer and music lesson provider in the country, will bring its national event tour, Upgrade Your Sound , to the Buffet Group Showroom on November 12 from 3 p.m. to 7 p.m. with live music performances to follow at 8 p.m. The showroom is located at 153 W 36th Street, 4th Floor, New York, NY 10018.
“For years, the Upgrade Your Sound events have been a huge draw for area musicians because it’s a free opportunity to try out hundreds of instruments and consult with representatives from major music brands like Buffet Group,” said Peter Buciak, regional sale director, Music & Arts. “We’re happy to give musicians an opportunity to try out their dream instruments before buying since finding the right instrument is such a pivotal decision.”
The Buffet Group NYC Showroom offers a great selection of Buffet Crampon, Besson, B&S, Antoine Courtois Paris, Hans Hoyer, Keilwerth, Melton Meinl Weston, J. Scherzer and W. Schreiber instruments. This event is free and open to the public, but appointments are highly recommended. Special discounts and financing options will be available for event attendees. Complimentary beverages and hors d’oeuvres will also be served.
“The selection of a new instrument is a special process for many musicians and we are very proud to be a part of that process,” said Francois Kloc, president and CEO, Buffet Group. ”This event at our showroom will represent our continued interest in pairing musicians with high-quality instruments.”
To learn more about this special Upgrade Your Sound or to RSVP, visit MusicArts.com/UYS .
###
About Music & Arts
The first Music & Arts, run by founder Benjamin O’Brien, opened in 1952 and was located in a small house in Bethesda, MD. Still run by the O’Brien family today, Music & Arts now has more than 500 retail and affiliate locations, 120 educational representatives and 33,000 lesson students making it the nation’s largest school music retailer and lesson provider. Now based in Frederick, MD, the company of trained musicians offers friendly service for everything musical in your life including instruments, lessons, rentals and repairs. Visit MusicArts.com for more information.
About Buffet Group
Created in 1825 in Paris, Buffet Crampon is the leading wind instruments manufacturer. Headquartered in Mantes-La-Ville, the history of the company dates back to 1789 (manufacture of the first trumpet by Antoine Courtois) and to 1825 (creation of the first clarinet by Buffet Crampon Paris). Buffet Crampon, the emblematic brand of Buffet group, is the world’s leading professional clarinets manufacturer.
